metadata.name: Waiting #1/20
metadata.description:
Still by day. Alive by night. This artwork tracks your local sunrise & sunset, creating a masterpiece that experiences time, just as you do.  
---  
The blue skies, now fill her eyes,  
As she looks for traces of him,  
A longing for love, it just defies,  
As signs of approach look slim.  

But she won't move or budge,  
So long as the sun still shines,  
Move she does and come alive,  
In darkness, her heart it pines.

Her love is only as incomplete,  
As it is strong and sure and firm,  
But she can't live, just all alone,  
For her fears, they'll all confirm.  

Some say that love is a luxury,  
And others say it's only fleeting,  
But for her it sure as day is just,  
Made true, with all her waiting.  

Written by Digipedia, 2022  

[View Fullscreen](https://transient-labs.infura-ipfs.io/ipfs/QmRqsyZbr9KKGi5Dx64FBhwC5PymdCbHWQbPPk82XD2Jbp)
